mapper.insert: insert into chat_group (emp_id,chat_room_id, msg_start_id, msg_end_id, name) value (#{emp_id},#{chat_room_id}, #{msg_start_id}, #{msg_end_id}, #{name})
mapper.select: SELECT cri.* FROM chat_room_list_info cri JOIN ( SELECT chat_room_id, MAX(write_date) AS latest_date FROM chat_room_list_info GROUP BY chat_room_id ) AS latest_messages ON cri.chat_room_id = latest_messages.chat_room_id AND cri.write_date = latest_messages.latest_date WHERE cri.emp_id=#{emp_id} ORDER BY cri.write_date DESC;
select * from company_hierarchy_view order by department_id, task_id, job_id

SELECT cg.chat_room_id FROM chat_group cg JOIN chat_room cr ON cg.chat_room_id = cr.id WHERE cg.emp_id IN (#{employee_id}, #{session_id}) AND cr.state = 'ACTIVEPERSONAL' GROUP BY cg.chat_room_id HAVING COUNT(*) = 2;
mapper.update: update chat_group set msg_end_id = #{msg_end_id} where emp_id = #{emp_id} and chat_room_id = #{chat_room_id}
update chat_group set name = #{name} where emp_id = #{emp_id} and chat_room_id = #{chat_room_id}
mapper.delete: delete from chat_group where emp_id = #{emp_id} and chat_room_id = #{chat_room_id}
